course_description: This course focuses on the role and professional obligations of the clinical perfusionist to their patients, within the interdisciplinary team, and within varied healthcare systems. Students will examine national policies and codes of conduct as they evolve in the role of clinical perfusionist.
prerequisites: CVP 566 or equivalent transfer credit as co-requisite. Students must enroll in CVP 566 first.
sections: Class Nbr: 5254, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 10a-12:50p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
